About.title: About Me
About.text: Passionate about technology from an early age, my journey began with studies in Systems Engineering in Venezuela and continues today at UTN (Argentina). With professional experience in companies and freelance or collaborative projects, I work as a Fullstack Developer with strong skills in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Docker, and more.
